archimate:Requirement.name: PA.1.6.9: Target ICS environments (including associated enterprise IT systems), such as those that are critical, high profile, new or have suffered a serious information security incident, should be identified and subjected to a rigorous information risk assessment, which may be combined/aligned with an operational risk assessment.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
